name: Ellie Island
description:
Secret Santa for 2022! Find your dog on an island adventure!

Instructions:

Hang out with your favorite dog by taking photos!

WASD to move

Left Shift to switch between top down and first person

C to take photo in first person

Arrow Keys up/down to look up/down in first person

Instructions for play are inside, as well as the goals! good luck. Take photos! Photos saved in %appdata%\Ellie Island\
